refnamediv.refpurpose: Moves the view center to (x, y, z).

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Moves the view center to (x, y, z). If z is not provided, then z=0 is used. The parameters x, y, z are integer values relative to the screen. For example, the center of the screen is (0, 0, 0) and the upper left corner is (-2048, 2047, 0).

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The two examples show the use of the sv command to move the view center to a particular location on the screen.

example.title: Keep the view center at the center of the screen.
Move the view center half way between the current view center and the right side of the view screen.
example.para: The view center is moved half way between the current view center and the right side of the view screen.
